enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Graduate Students.
title: SoC COMM_ST 525-0-20 Seminar-Problems in Comm Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This seminar will review the new and most recent research literature on how children and adolescents use and are influenced by digital media, especially the newer interactive technologies of tablets, smartphones, interactive toys and the internet.

subject: COMM_ST
